recipes.label: Study a Dearly Departed's Papers
recipes.startdescription: This situation requires discretion. Society considered our association improper.
recipes.description: Our relations were never formalised. It would be unthinkable that I would inherit a significant portion of the estate. Nevertheless, I have been well provided for.

Something has gone awry. Our former acquaintances cross the street when I pass. A newspaper hints at foul play. The solicitor will not receive me. I can expect no bequest, and there may be worse to come.

recipes.label: As At Issus
recipes.startdescription: I have the opportunity to turn against our Shaper, as the Lionsmith did against the Colonel. [This will prevent your previous character from ever ascending, but give you the opportunity to win a standard Forge victory. It will have no other effect.]
recipes.description: The chain of loyalty is shattered. My followers will suspect nothing. By the time our Shaper can return from their exile, I will be gone, or I will be forever.

recipes.label: The Selectest of Menus
recipes.startdescription: If I consume what remains of Lady Tryphon, I will not be consumed. [This will prevent your previous character from ever ascending, but give you the opportunity to win a standard Grail victory. It will have no other effect.]
recipes.description: The taste is bright on my tongue. There will be no Vitulation for our Delight. My followers will serve my desires. For now, I will devour; I will not be devoured.

recipes.label: One Door Closes
recipes.startdescription: The Diarist has given me the means to abandon our Illuminated One to the Mansus. [This will prevent your previous character from ever ascending, but give you the opportunity to win a standard Lantern victory. It will have no other effect.]
recipes.description: I have closed the door in my eye. I have sealed it with wax. That eye is blind, but the other sees new horizons. Our organisation will serve a different end. Perhaps one day I will greet our Founder as a peer.

recipes.label: Empty and Alone
recipes.startdescription: 'One more stone in the Mansus-wall.' Is that all I am? Is there anything else? [This will prevent your previous character from ever ascending, and add Dread to the board. It will have no other effect.]
recipes.description: I will live out my life according to my choices. What I am is what I will be, until I am nothing at all.
